title: 30 rp ?
body: opened a epic reksai and was overwhelmed with joy, but my happiness was slowly killed when i discovered i needed 30 more rp to buy the actual beauty that is RekSai. please help my unfortunate soul and donate 30 rp <3

replies.body: We'd like to help!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or send a [tweet](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport), and we'll see what we can do!
